titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 4,4'-methylenebis(2-chloroaniline).
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 4,4'-methylenebis(2-chloroaniline).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 4,4'-methylenebis(2-chloroaniline).
